page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: {60%}of the people in our area are {employed.}My mum and dad are both {unemployed}but my best friend's dad is a publican. The types of jobs some parents have in our school are: builder, cleaner, taxi driver and a computer programmer.{68%}of the {employed}parents are "blue collar" workers (manual),{20%}service industry workers (bus driver) and{12%}are "white collar" workers (bank clerk). Sometimes people who are{employed}go on strike because they think that they do not get enough pay. However most people are very thankful that they have got a job and never go on strike. {By Diane Lydiate (11yrs.)
